Package com.threecrickets.prudence

Class Summary
ApplicationTask<T> A Runnable wrapper for a Scripturian Executable.
ApplicationTaskCollector A cron4j TaskCollector designed to poll a crontab-like file every minute.
DelegatedCacheKeyPatternHandler A DelegatedHandler with the following supported entry points: handleCacheKeyPattern(conversation, variables)
DelegatedFilter A Filter that wraps an underlying DelegatedHandler.
DelegatedHandler A general-purpose delegate used to enter defined entry points in a Scripturian Executable.
DelegatedResource A Restlet resource that delegates functionality to a Scripturian Executable via entry points.
DelegatedScriptletPlugin A DelegatedHandler with the following supported entry points: getScriptlet(code, content)
DelegatedStatusService Allows delegating the handling of errors to specified restlets.
GeneratedTextResource A Restlet resource which executes a "text with scriptlets" Scripturian Executable document for GET and POST verbs and redirects its standard output to a StringRepresentation.
PrudenceApplication A Restlet Application that returns Status.CLIENT_ERROR_NOT_FOUND when it is stopped.
PrudenceDaemon Delegates to Main, using the Apache Commons Daemon.
PrudenceRouter A Router with shortcut methods.
SerializableApplicationTask<T> A serializable wrapper for an ApplicationTask.
SourceCodeResource A Restlet resource that returns a formatted textual representation of Scripturian DocumentDescriptor source code.
